11112.content:
It was the usual morning for Mad Dog. Taking his time getting up. But before getting up, he contemplated if he is in the mood to relieve some body urges (that adults have).
But this time he felt none of that. He thought it was strange at first, but his dry throat made him get out of bed and into the bathroom to drink tap water.

He stumbled groggily into the bathroom and poured some water into a glass cup. When he finished drinking he noticed his reflection in the cracked and dirty mirror that the bathroom lightbulb barely managed to illuminate. As his eyes adjusted and focused on the mirror, he pinched his cheek with his free hand. Realizing this is not a dream, he started to shake, and not just because it was so cold in the bathroom. The more he looked at his reflection, the more he was shaking until he reached a boiling point and screamed out loudly, breaking the glass cup he was holding in his hand and using the same hand to punch the mirror, shattering it to pieces and denting the wall it was hanging on.

His panic attack lasted for a few minutes, but when he was out of energy, he went out of the bathroom and sit on the edge of the bed. Then he was in a daze, so many things going through his mind. He was now a she! Mad Dog was beside himself/herself.
How did this happen? Why?
After a few moments there was a knock at the door. "S**t" Mad Dog cursed quietly. She woke up the other people in the motel.
What to do now?

After a week in the strange coma, Owen woke up and felt different somehow. He couldn't explain it, but his body didn't feel right. "Owen, you contracted a very rare virus known as Changeling. It only affects males and turns its victims into females with varying ages. I'm afraid there is no cure." the doctor explained grimly.

"So, I'm stuck like this...forever?!" the now female Owen screeched.

What now?

choices: The next day at the lab
1121222111112.content:
After diligently reviewing your notes for a solution to get your body back to normal, you realize your two year old self needs to rest. You lay down on the couch and when you wake up you are confused. You look around for a few seconds and recognize that you are in Rain’s apartment. You stand up and notice you are now inside a crib and can’t get out? Even more surprising is that you look down and realize you are wearing a new pink dress. Rain comes in the bedroom and smiles, “Wow? You slept for nearly 3 hours! I found you asleep on your couch and brought you back to my place. Fortunately I have this crib because I baby-sit a lot.” Rain set down a baby monitor and giggled, “I heard you fussing around and knew you were finally awake!”

“3 hours?” You reply, “I can’t believe I wasted the entire day? Being in this body certainly wastes valuable time! I could have been reviewing my notes and finding a way to get back to my normal body!” You look down at your new pink dress and ask Rain, “What’s with this?”

Rain picks you up out of the crib and says, “When I found you asleep on your couch, you were wet. You totally soaked your clothes. Luckily, my niece Anna left a few things here and I was able to find you a new outfit.”

Rain placed you on your back and pulled down your tights. With a wink, she said, “It looks like somebody needs another diaper change!”


You watch Rain change your diaper as you say, “Thanks for doing this. I don’t have the dexterity to change my own diaper in this body.” Once she finished changing your diaper, Rain pulled a pair of tights over your diaper. You stood in front of the mirror and were surprised at your new outfit. Your pink frilly dress was slightly above your knees and flared out really wide, “Isnt this a bit fancy? Did Anna leave anything else here?”

Rain giggled, “Anna loves to play dress up. You are wearing her princess gown. Lucky for you, she also left her shoes here too!” You watch as Rain puts on a pair of maryjanes on your feet. Rain continues, “It was either that dress…or this one!” Rain pulled out a much fancier flower girl dress to show you. Rain winks, “I almost put this one on you, but I didn’t want you to get it dirty.”


As you start walking away, you feel your diaper crinkling with each step. You tell Rain, “We need to get back to my apartment so I can look over my notes!”

Just then, the professor walked in the door and saw you. With a smirk, the professor says, “Cute dress! I love the bow!’

You feel your cheeks turn red as you reply, “It’s a long story. What did you learn about the experiment?”

The professor picked you up and smiled, “The good news is that I talked to your other professors and managed to convince them that you were working on a special project for me. You don’t have to go to any other class in the mean time! I also coordinated daycare with the university. I pulled some strings to get you in while I am teaching classes. I told them I was watching my niece.”

“Daycare?” You say with crossed arms.

The professor looks at Rain with a disappointed look. Rain replies, “He…I mean SHE just woke up. I didn’t have time to tell her!”

You still aren’t used to being called, ‘she’ as you say, “Didn’t tell me what?”

The professor explains, “Even though you have your normal college mind, you are currently in the body of a 2 year old. We cant leave you alone in your apartment anymore. You will have to spend the day at daycare until I can sneak you into the lab after my 3 o’clock class.”

Your eyes get wide as you complain, “Daycare? You can’t be serious? I need to work during the day to figure out how to change back to normal!”

Rain interrupts, “You cant even change your own diaper. You need some supervision until we fix this mess. You will have plenty of time in the evenings to go over your notes and figure out a solution. But during the day when I am in class and the professor is teaching, you need to be somewhere safe!”

The professor nodded her head, “You should be thankful I was able to pull some strings. There is a long list to be accepted into the university daycare. You are going to have to use fragmented sentences and loosen your vocabulary while you are there. We cant risk anybody finding out who you really are.”

“I can’t believe this! This is going to extend my research considerably!”

The professor patted your back, “I’m sorry sweetie, but until we figure this out, you are going to have to play the roll of the body you are in. It is the only way.”

Rain handed you a glass of water, “Here. This will make you feel better.”

You take the water and roll your eyes, “A sippy cup? Seriously?”

Rain giggles, “I don’t want to clean up after your spills all night. You are going to have to get used to little kid stuff for the time being!”

You take a drink and then realize they are right. Until you figure out a fix to your body, you are stuck like this. You then say, “Fine, but can we at least get me some pants? These dresses are killing me!“

Rain and the professor laugh. Rain then explains, “It is much easier to change your diaper with a dress on. If you don’t mind, it would be easier for us all if you just wore dresses?“

Realizing she was right, you groan, “Ok, but once I’m back to normal, I better not hear anything about this. This is embarrassing enough!“

The professor and Rain giggle again as you start looking over your notes.
1121222111112.title: You awake after a nap

11212221111121.content:
The following afternoon, the professor finally picks you up from daycare. As you walk down the hallway towards the lab, she asks, “So? Was daycare as bad as you thought?”

You look up at her with a glare, “Oh no! It was great! I got to spend the day singing nursery rhymes. I even got to play with dolls for a few hours! It was SUPER fun!“

The professor giggled, “Wow! Somebody is a bit sarcastic today!”

You point down to your dress and say, “I still can’t believe you made me wear this today? This dress barely hangs half way to my knees!“

The professor explained, “That’s why you have on tights. Girls your age don’t have any idea how to hide their dignity. You should relax. That dress looks cute on you. All the rest of the girls were wearing similar outfits.“

You crack a smile and reply, “You are right. I kept seeing other girls lifting their dresses up over their heads and had no idea what they were doing!”

The professor laughed, “That’s what girls your age do. It’s not until age 5 or 6 where girls realize that’s inappropriate.” The professor then joked, “Relax…You still have a few years left of getting away with that!”

You look up at the professor and glare, “Ha ha! Very funny! Let’s just get to the lab so I can finally get some research done and figure out how to change back to normal! I’m not spending any more time in this body than I have to! Wearing diapers is getting starting to get old fast!”

The professor nodded, “That reminds me. You only have few left. We need to stop on the way home to get you some more.”

As you enter the lab, you are relieved you will finally get a chance to access the computer system. As you try to enter the lab, the night security guard notices you and says, “Excuse me professor…But I’m sure you are familiar with the age restriction allowed in this area. Minors under the age of 18 are not allowed inside.“

You and the professor were both familiar with the campus rule. However, you both overlooked the detail when planning to visit the lab. The professor tries to convince the security guard, “Would it be ok to stretch the rules this one time? I have some crucial research I need to do tonight for a few hours.“ The professor winks at you and continues, “She is a very well behaved little girl. I promise she wont be any trouble inside the lab.”

The security guard didn’t budge and replied, “Sorry professor, but unless she leaves the premises, I will have to file a report. You don’t want a report on your record do you?”

Just then, a fellow student of yours named Abby approaches. She is always staying late in the lab trying to get extra credit. Abby witnessed the entire conversation and interrupts, “Hi Professor! Who is this little cutie?“

The Professor quickly replies, “Uh..She is my niece, Pandora. I’m watching her for the next few weeks. “

Abby smiled at you and says, “I love your dress Pandora!“ You give her a fake smile back.

Being the ‘brown noser’ Abby is, she tells the professor, “I heard you mention you have some very important research to finish tonight. I will take Pandora back to my dorm room and watch her while you work.“ Abby bends down to your level and smiles, “We are going to have so much fun! I have some nail polish that will go perfect with your outfit! And if the professor says it’s ok, I have some lipstick that I know you would love to wear!” Abby then pats your head and says, “Your straight hair is really cute, but I’m sure it even looks better with curls!”

You are smart enough to know a girl your age would love to play dress up. The last thing you want to do is go with the brown noser Abby and get some sort of makeover. However, you know the security guard will not let you in. He even threatened reporting the professor for trying to sneak you inside. Not wanting to risk the professor’s lab access, you swallow your pride and give a fake smile back to Abby and try to look excited. Abby takes your hand and tells the professor, “Don’t worry, us girls will have some fun while you finish your research!“

You and the professor are both relieved Abby somehow managed to handle the awkward situation. You are at least glad one of you will be able to get some research done tonight. Before you know it, Abby picks you up and you start walking to her dorm room. You look back at the professor and see her holding back a grin at your predicament.

Jeff felt odd. He looked up at his wife. "I don't feel good. I think I will go to bed." He went to bed and crashed.

In the morning, he woke up to a woman's screams. His eyes opened, and he went to jump out of bed to see what was wrong. The blankets felt very heavy for some reason, and more than that, when he went to stand up, he fell to the floor! How did the bed get so high? When he went to get up, he had to brush long, brown hair out of his eyes. This was strange. He has had short his entire life.

He looked up and the room was very strange. Not only was all of the furniture huge, but it was not his bedroom at all. It was like a little girls room, only the dolls and stuffed animals were as huge as the furniture, except for a table and some chairs. As he got up, he felt odd. He looked down at himself and got an even bigger shock, the room was not big, he was small, like a child! Worse, he was dressed in little girls pajamas, and now he could tell that he was also wearing a diaper! What was going on? He felt very scared. Only now did he also notice that some if his discomfort was from an obvious mess he had in his diaper. He was scared, and suddenly he could not stop himself from peeing also. The way it felt coming out, he was sure the he was not only dressed like a little girl, he really was a little girl! He couldn't control himself and he started to cry.

Through the tears, Jeff saw a young woman appear in the doorway of his room. She was pretty, with long blonde hair and blue eyes, but looked very frazzled and confused, but something in his head told him who this woman was, and he needed comforting so badly he called to her, "Mommy!" He instinctively held up his arms.

She hesitated a long time, so he tried again, "Mommy! Help me!"

The woman seemed to make a decision. She came over and picked Jeff up. Jeff found himself comforted as she said, "Shhhhhh. It's okay sweetie. Mommy is here." She sniffed, "Oh, and just great. What a welcome I get." She seemed to be distracted, "Well, here goes nothing." She lifted Jeff onto a changing table and proceeded to undress and change him. She left him on the table, which seemed to be super high, and went over to a dresser and picked something out. She said, "Well, we might as well have you looking pretty."

Jeff was dismayed that it was a lavender dress with unicorns on it, but he did not seem to have a choice, and found himself somewhat comforted by the feeling of the dress. Then she sat him up and brushed his hair. When she was done, she sat him on the floor. "Now, why don't you play like a good girl for mommy while I go figure out if we have some food around here?"

Jeff watched her go. What a strange mommy! He sat down on one of the little chairs wondering how he got here, into this body, with a mommy he had never seen before? What next?

He was wise with his money his whole life. In fact he always planned ahead, played it safe, and was always so careful. The little house near the beach he bought years ago when the prices were right. When he retired he had enough savings to last him and his wife for the rest of their lives. As it turned out that was only two months after retirement for his wife. He still thinks back to that moment so many years ago. He had hoped he would soon follow her, but it wasn't the case. He has been blessed our cursed with good health. Another product of his careful choices over the years. Their kids have lives of their own and he's lucky to get a card at Christmas now. Milton sighs and looks around. He feels out of place and without purpose. The beeping of the metal detector distracts him from feeling sorry for himself. He sets the detector down and pulls out a small garden spade. He doesn't have to dig very far before the spade strikes metal. "Not jewelry", Milton thinks to himself. He digs the object out and looks at it. It appears old, very old. It looks like one of those magic lamps from those Aladdin stories. With a little polish he figures someone will buy it. Milton sits back and begins to rub the sand off of it. Some young college age kids then run out onto the beach. Milton does not even notice the smoke coming out of the lamp. Milton reminisces as he watches the young people. For a second he imagines himself as one of them again, his whole life in front of them. He would do things different. He would have more fun, take more chances, and live more in the present than always planning for a future that may never come. He mentally shuts those thoughts down. 1341.content:
It was a bright Saturday afternoon, and Melanie Kelos felt like doing some exploring. The rambunctious 12-year-old was unlike most children her age. Melanie had very few friends, and on the weekends, she didn't go to the movies or hang out at other people's houses. Melanie's main hobby was rocks. She loved rocks. Collecting them, studying them, and scavenging for them. Melanie knew she was going to be a geologist one day.

Equipped with her backpack and magnifying glass, Melanie made another trek into the woods near her house. The time spent away from her house did Melanie a lot of good. Melanie had a loving mother and father, but she's always felt distant from them. For reasons she could never explain, Melanie always felt unease with herself, as if some part of her was just...off.

Melanie was running through the forest, her long, blonde ponytail bouncing up and down. She had a goal of finding at least one new rock today, but Melanie was okay with appreciating the scenery around her. As she looked up at the giant fir tree next to her, Melanie noticed a shining blue object on one of the lower branches. She didn't know what it was, but she sure was going to find out.

Using every bit of her 4"9, 92-pound frame, Melanie managed to climb ten feet up the tree, until she found the branch with the object. Trying to preserve her balance, Melanie tried to stretch her arm as out as far as possible to reach it. With a slight lean to the left, Melanie was able to grasp the object and carefully make her way back down the tree.

"You are a beauty" Melanie exclaimed to herself.

"Hello my child"

"WHO SAID THAT!" Melanie blurted out. She looked around nervously.

"Don't worry young one, I am emanating from the jewel you found. My consciousness resides in there."

"Wha...what? You're INSIDE the jewel?" Melanie asked. She was very confused.

"No, no, no...I am a spirit of enchantment. I have no corporeal form, I exist for only one purpose....to help out those in need, and I sense you're in need child."

"What do you mean?:

"I feel a deep, deep sadness within you....I don't what I can do....wait...wait...yes..I see. Child, I am going to grant you a gift."

"A gift?!!??" Melanie perked up. "Can I pick what it is?"

"No...it is granting your subconscious desires...it will change your life as you know it forever."

Melanie paused. She wasn't so sure about this.

"That seems pretty vague." Melanie stated. "Can you tell me what it is?"

"No...the magic is rendered null and void if I state the purpose of the gift before you receive it."

Melanie took all of that in. Only 12, she still had a lifetime of possibilities ahead of her. Yet...would her life be truly enjoyable if she passed on this opportunity? Not many people have the ability to have their deepest inner desires to be fulfilled, and Melanie felt like she couldn't pass that up, even without knowing what the gift was. Of course, part of her was afraid that the gift would make her even less happy.

After a good 10 minute of thinking, Melanie came to a decision: she would accept the jewel's gift.

"I want it, whatever it is." Melanie said out loud for some reason.

"I am glad my young one....now in order to receive the gift, you must grasp me firmly in your hand and recite the following chant: Tethers of time and physics, break the chains and grant me that which I deserve."

Melanie picked the jewel out of her jean pocket and gripped it as hard as she could. "Tethers of time and physics........break the chains....and grant me...." Melanie stopped. For a moment, she felt frightened and unsure. However, she managed to convince herself that it was the right move. She deserved genuine happiness.

"....that which I deserve."

As soon as the words left her lips, Melanie felt changes. Green pixels of energy started to come towards her and encircle her body. They started with her boots, worked up through her jeans, and then through her sweater. Soon, Melanie was completely covered in the energy. Suddenly, her body started rumbling.

"What's happening to me?!!?" Melanie shrieked.

"Don't worry child...just relax."

After a minute , the rumbling stopped. And then, the changes came. Her tiny hands started to enlargen greatly, as did her feet. Melanie felt her skeleton growing and stretching; she was getting taller. She started to feel heavier as a significant amount of body mass was added to her frame. Her tiny breasts disappeared. Her legs and arms widened and lengthened. Soon, the body mass tightened, into what Melanie believed were muscles.

"This is weird." Melanie exclaimed, her voice getting progressively deeper.

The changes then went to her privates, reshaping into male equipment. Finally, her face was affected. Melanie felt her skull and the body mass on it rearranging. Her nose changed shape and her lips got bigger. An Adam's apple developed in her throat. The last change came as hair developed all over her new body. Oddly enough, the hair on her head did not change. Her clothes grew in size to accommodate her new frame.

The energy on Melanie dissipated. Disoriented and not very aware of her surroundings, she heard the voice speak again.

"If you like, you can go look in the stream to see the fruits of your gift."

Melanie got up gingerly and walked to wards the stream. She felt off, but couldn't put why. As she reached the stream, Melanie bent down and looked at her reflection. She gasped. Starting back at her was not a 12-year-old girl, but rather a large 30-year-old male version of herself.

She started examining herself. Melanie looked quite handsome. The transformation sent the former child to a massive 6"3, 196 pounds. Melanie started touching her body. She felt all the new muscles on her body. She felt...strong. Despite the dramatic physical change, Melanie felt unusually comfortable.

"I....why this?" Melanie covered her mouth, startled by how much deeper her new voice was.

"Chil...sir, I am able to see a person's soul for what it really is. I could see that you felt burdened by what you were, or rather what you were forced into. You may have been presented to the world as a female child, but you desperately wanted to be a boy, a man. You learned for the freedom to express yourself as you truly are and you wanted to be able to take control of your life and chase your dreams, only as an adult could. You were just never able to actualize these yearnings into cognitive thought."

Melanie took all of this in. At first, she totally rejected it. What would this thing know about me, she/he thought. But then she thought about it more. Ever since she could form thoughts, happiness had always been brief for Melanie. All the nights spent up crying, failing to understand why. The inability to connect with or express herself to other people. The constant, negative personal thoughts about her appearance. It all made sense now.

For the first time in her entire life, Melanie was in her right body, able to show the world who she/he truly is. As Melanie gathered her thoughts, she came to a realization: she was genuinely happy. So happy, she burst into tears.

"Thank you....thank you, so much."

Melanie got up and started walking. As a new person, she had to take care of some things.

Six-year-old David looked out at the window, getting ready for bed. But before we went to sleep, he was really worried about his father. His dad, Daniel, was still depressed about what happened to his wife, David’s mother, Alicia. A few months ago, she was on the way home to get grocery. But suddenly, some drunk driver careened off the road and hit her car, creating a horrendous accident. She died the moment of impact. After the accident, the family had been devastated by the news. Even after the funeral, his dad was still distraught and barely focuses on his job. Indeed, it takes time to heal those wounds, but Alicia was everything in the world for him and they knew each other since they were kids. David knew that his mother went to Heaven and become an angel, but a part of him wanted his mom to return, so that his dad will be happy again. He wanted to do something for his father, something to make him feel better.

As he was looking out at the window in his room, David noticed a shooting star in the distance. He knew in stories that when you wish upon a shooting star, that your wish would come true. Looking up at the star, he closed his eyes and chanted those words.

“Star light, star bright, first star I’ve seen tonight. I wish I may, I wish I might, have this wish I wish tonight. I wish that my dad would be happy again. Ever since he lost mommy in that accident, I don’t want him to be upset. I would like to help him out the best I could and will do anything to make him feel better about himself. Please grant me this wish.”

As soon as he finished his wish, he went right to bed fell into a deep sleep.

“Ready to party, lovely?” asked Don, gently grabbing Erica's shoulders. They began to dance and chat.

“I may as well, I'm not getting any younger” said Erica pensively, putting her best fake smile forward. She actually hated this and wanted to become Eric again so badly. She silently memorized every prayer she knew that she could find the witch who cursed her friends and plead for mercy.

Just as the Spanish language “He Vinido” started to wind down, which Erica recognized from an episode of Breaking Bad, the song “Mrs. Robinson” started to play over the speakers.

“Oh no!” whimpered Erica to herself in an audible whisper.

“What's wrong?” asked Don with a playful smile. “Don't like Simon & Garfunkel? I do, but I've got an old soul.”

“No, I do. It's...nothing” said Erica, her voice low as a mouse.

Don looked into Erica's eyes.

“What is it?”

“Well, you might have an old soul, but I don't. It's kind of complicated.”

“Of course you don't have an old soul, you're a cougar.”

“I'm a what!?” asked Erica, almost offended.

“Sorry. I mean, most women your age are settled down and married, waiting to grow old with their lovers, watching wistfully from the sidelines while the next generation grow ups and take over the world...but not you. You're a free spirit, Erica, and you and your girlfriends probably like younger guys such as myself because it helps keep you feel young. Am I right or am I wrong? Do I have you all figured out, lady?”

Erica was about to answer Don, but out of the corner of her eye was the witch!

There she was, fifty feet away. She was at a table all alone by herself, eating curly fries and drinking a beer, watching with intent amazement that her magical concoction was going off without a hitch.

“Uh, sorry buddy, but I've got to go” said Erica, letting go of Don.

She ran across the dance floor, narrowly avoiding crashing into a few other couples making their way across the bar

“Please!” blubbered Erica as she approached the witch, the tears falling down her face, her voice shaky. “I don't want to be a little old lady. I don't to be 103 and die! Please, have mercy on me and Dan and Donald. Change us back. I'm sorry! We're just stupid kids, and we didn't know what we were doing!”

Erica even fell to the ground.

“Erica, what's wrong?” asked Don. “Are you having a panic attack?” asked the younger man. The crowd of bar patrons was somehow disinterested in what was going on and paid the crying blonde woman no mind.

“Well, that's quite a performance, deary.”

“It's not a performance” said Erica, her voice low again. “I...”, but Erica could not finish.

“Now you're making... those other two guys...into...old men” said Erica very slowly, as she was starting to hyperventilate. “They...don't...deserve that. They...did nothing...wrong. Please forgive...the three of us.”

“So this is what you meant by 'It's complicated'” said Don to himself. The witch put down her fries and smiled at both of them.

145111112121111221222.content:
"Well, dear, It seems we're in a bit of a pickle here." The witch said, just she happened to chomp on a pickle that came with her fries. "You see, I can't just reverse the spell as is. Magic, as you can imagine is a pretty complicated mess. But…"

"But… But… But what?" Erica said, trying to use every fiber of his mind to forget about his changes and get back to his normal, average, simple life.

"But… I can offer you a deal." The Witch grinned a toothy, yellow grin.

Don, meanwhile, looked on in a strange mix of curiosity and horror. "A deal? Is this woman a wicked witch or a devil?

"What's the deal?" Erica asked, being drawn in.

"You see, my dear, I cannot simply change all of you. It would be too dangerous not just for us, but for everyone in this room. However, if I could change a couple of you… I might be able to do something." The Witch replied.

"You're saying… only I get to change back? Erica asked, sadly.

"Ahh, you think too much of me, dear. You should know by now that even when I'm fair, I'm not. It is not you who gets to change. It is them."

Don's eyes widened as Erica stared off into the distance. He tried to spot his now lady friends, but there were no sign of them. The dance floor was too packed to see beyond anything.

"My offer is this, dear. Your friends can change as long as you make the promise to spend your days in a new life as a middle aged woman." The witch said.

"Erica, don't!" Don said, stepping in abruptly, "I don't trust her…"

The Witch laughed. "Ah. I see you're the white knight type. I see a very interesting future for you…"

"Don, don't get involved. This is my cross to bear. You see how dangerous this all is." Erica said before turning to the witch.

"You give your word?" Erica said, sternly.

"Of course! A deal's a deal. All you need to do… is shake." The Witch said, extending her hand.

Erica looked at the wrinkled hand, then across the dance floor, then back to the hand. She grabbed the hand firmly, closed her eyes, and shook.

"Haha. It is done!" The witch said. Erica felt a very sudden and strong breeze. When she opened her eyes, the witch was gone.

Erica flicked her blonde hair back as she looked in a mirror than hung behind the bartenders across the way. She looked at the woman she had now permanently become, and sighed. All she could do now was accept her new life.

"That was very foolish and brave of you to do." Don said, not really thinking if the words he was saying were helpful or hurtful.

Erica looked at him, and gave the boy a hug and a kiss on the cheek.

"Thanks. Same to you. Knowing that transformation exists and still putting yourself in the line of fire." Erica said.

"I can't help it, I guess." Don said, looking down at himself briefly to see if he had indeed changed at all,

"Well, it shows good character. You're gonna find a lot of love in your life." Erica said, thinking about the youth she lost. Somehow, in all of this nonsense, she felt more mature. Maybe it was the magic talking, but she felt like an adult woman now, instead of a young boy.

"Come on, let's see if my friends even still recognize me." Erica said, as she took Don's hand and led him back to the table.

Tony and his mother were at the mall one afternoon, and Tony was very angry to say the least.

"But mom, I wanted to hang out with my friends today!"

"Sheesh Tony, you whine like a little girl."

"Aw, shut up."

Just as he said that, time seemed to stop as an old woman steoped next to him.

Tony looked around, wondering what was going on.

"Whoa, what happened?"

"You know, little snots like you make me sick. All you do is complain and disrespect your elders. Boys should be nicer to their mothers."

"Really, you're going to get after me for telling her to shut up? I wasn't even disrespecting her!"

"Silence! I punish you to a life of motherhood! Let's see how you like it!"

"What?"

Then a bright flash enveloped Tony, and he woke up several hours later.

14521121.content:
Who are the mother and son

Rachael Conner: A 35-year-old professional scientist at a top branch of advance medicine that wanted to have a better life.

Thomas Conner: An 8-year-old boy that wishes to be just like his mom.
14521121.title: Choose your characters

145211211.content:
She did it! Rachael did it! After months of planning and research, she has done it. As a highly regarded scientist in her field she was working a formula that can turn anyone who drinks it into another person. She worked hard trying to get this formula right. And through all that hard work, she finally managed to create it. Right on the table are two separate viles filled with two colored liquids. One of the liquids is blue while the other is pink as they contain the DNA of herself and her son, Thomas. Looking to the blue liquid, she smiled and was eager to try it, but not before her son comes back from school.

Ever since he was born, Rachael was a bit envious of her own son. He had the youth, the energy, and the freedom that was taken away from her when she was young. Sometimes she wished that she would be in his shoes so she can enjoy the carefree experience he is having. Now thanks to the formula she created she can not only live that dream, but also her son. For she knew that Thomas's dream is to be like her mom, always responsible and in charge of the house. Not to mention understanding what it would be like to be a woman. After all, Rachael is still quite a looker.

Turning to the mirror next to her, she was still hot in her age. At thirty-five, she had a voluptuous body with melons sized CC cup breasts, a curvy hourglass figure, and a round rear. She also has a beautiful face with high cheekbones, a thin and petite nose, and an emerald eye color. She even have luscious amber hair that goes down to her back, though she done it up in a tight bun whenever she goes to work. Of course she was showing signs of aging from the way her breasts sagged, to a bit of muffin top on the hips to escalate the curves, the faint lines around her eyes and mouth, and the hair looking duller then before with a few gray streaks weaved here and there. But still, she has the look to die for. Though it will be sad to loose this body over a young male boy, she knew that she must sacrifice herself to live a different life.

Looking at herself in detail, she soon heard the sound of the bus horn and turned to see the window Approaching it, she could see a school bus parked on the side as someone was getting out. He was a young boy of eight with a thin stature and black hair short hair and the same emerald eyes as her. She knew that this is her son and was ready to tell him the good news. So she left her room with the two viles and went downstairs to the living room, waiting for him to enter.

At the main hall, the door opened and young Thomas entered the house, plopping his bookbag on the floor. "Mommy!" he screamed out loud, "I'm home!" He waited to hear her when she said not far from her, "I'm in the living room! Please come here. There's something I want to tell you."

Thomas heard her and was confused with what she wants him for. But he decided to listen to her as he walked to the living room and saw her sitting on the sofa with the two viles on the table. "Have a seat." she said to him, "I want to show you something."

Thomas was still confused as he wondered why his mom was acting this way. Normally, it was the whole 'How was school today sweetie?', 'Did you get into a fight with those bullies?, or 'Have you met any cute girls lately?'. But now it seems she was interested of something and wanted to share it with him. Curious, he headed to the couch on the opposite end and sat there, starring in front of her.

"Yes mom?" he asked, "What is it? What do you want that is important?"

Rachael took a deep breath and was ready to share this with him. "Well, I was wondering... Remember when you told me you wish to be just like me when you grow up?"

Thomas blinked and answered a little awkwardly "Yes... I remember... But that was when I said that you are the best mom out there. Why you ask?"

Rachael smirked and continued with her talk. "Well, truth be told, I always wanted to be like you."

Thomas raised an eyebrow and was still confused by this reaction. "Okay..." he said, "Where are you going with this, mom?"

The mother laughed it off and explained about it. "You see, Thomas, I always wish to be in your shoes because you always have such youth and freedom, while I have to work continuously on projects at work all day. I didn't want to push myself a lot. And since you want to be in my place, It is a perfect opportunity to try out what I was working with at my job." She then showed him the two viles on the table and asked, "Do you know what this is?"

Thomas looked to the viles and answered back. "Those look like the viles from your job. Why are they doing here?"

"I'll explain." she continued, "You see, in these viles contains a formula that can turn someone into another person, be that of a different race, gender, or age. These two contain DNA of the you and me and ones used, can turn ourselves into each other."

Thomas heard that and was surprised by that sudden news. "Wait a second," he stopped her, "back up. Are you telling me that if I take one of them, I can turn into you?"

Rachael nodded as she said, "That's right. And if I use the other, I can turn into you."

Thomas shocked expression turned into pure joy and he jumped up and said, "Yes! I can be a mother! This is the most awesome thing ever!" He soon stopped what he's doing and realized something else. "But, how did you get that DNA from me and you? It's not possible that you took it from me without looking."

The mother giggled and said, "Simple, I took you to the doctor to get ourselves a blood test. Of course that was really me setting it up so I could get the blood and extracted the DNA out of it to put in the formula."

Thomas soon remembered that moment as he rubbed his arm from the pain. "Oh right... I remember that." he said with embarrassment, "It was a real pain."

"But it's worth the pain!" she continued, "Once to use these viles, we will be in each other shoes living different lives. Truelly a dream come true."

The son soon thought of something and asked, "But even if our bodies are different, shouldn't our minds be the same? I mean, people would get suspicious that the two of us would be acting strange in each others places."

Rachael smiled and let him know of something else. "Oh Thomas, you worry on the little things. See, not only have I extracted the DNA, but also the knowledge, memories, and mannerisms of each other. This will make our new lives easier. But remember, we will still be ourselves, but in different bodies and minds. This is a once in a lifetime opportunity, Thomas. Do you want to miss out on a chance like that?"

Thomas heard her and gave it some thought. Sure, the idea of trading each others lives would be cool, but then there's the mentality part of it as well. The last thing he wanted is to think that he's his on mom and forget about his old life. However, his mom knows what she's doing and is eager to give it a try. So he made his decision and said, "All right, I'll do it. But I only ask one thing. If we are going to turn into each other, how long does the effects last?"

Rachael knew that he's really starting to question it and gave him in the hones truth. "Let's see... If I were to guess I say the affects will last until..."

"...tomorrow afternoon, and then the process will repeat itself."

"Repeat itself?" Thomas looked puzzled. "So, if I take this now, I'll be you tomorrow, me the day after that, you again the next day, and on and on and..."

Rachael beamed."That's right! And it's almost four o'clock right now, so we'll be swapping every day after you get back from school."

As she reached for the vials, Thomas grabbed her other hand. "Wait, wait, Mommy! Something doesn't make sense."

Rachael paused and looked at her son. Thomas was in his thinking pose; eyes absently gazing at his shoes, his left hand slowly twirling a lock of his hair. "I really want a chance to be Mommy, and I think it would be fun for a little bit. But if we keep switching forever, what do we do if we want to stop? What if one of us gets hurt or sick and is stuck at home?" Thomas frowned and his voice grew quieter. "What if I . . . "

"Start forgetting who you are after switching so much?"

Thomas nodded. Rachael couldn't help but laugh inwardly at her worrywart of a son. Rachael had a habit of chasing wild ideas, both at work and at home, and while Thomas would always enthusiastically join her, she sometimes felt that Thomas fretted enough to be the mother of their household after all.

She stuffed the vials in her pocket and stood up from the sofa. "Follow me, Tommy," she said as she led him to the calendar on the wall. She pulled out the pen she always kept in her pocket and pointed to the day's date, October 15th. "Every day, we're going to write down who you are changing into that afternoon. If you ever feel unsure about who you are, just look at this calendar and you'll remember." She pointed to the blue silicone wristband Thomas was wearing on his left arm. "If you want to be super sure, wear that wristband all the time and you can always remind yourself."

Rachael knelt down and put her hands on Thomas's shoulders. "Also, your Mommy's smart, which means you're smart too. I'll tell you how we can stop if we ever want to, and if we run into a problem, we'll just figure it out like we always have. Okay?"

After thinking for a bit, Thomas returned his mother's smile. "Okay, let's do it!"

Rachael smacked a kiss on Thomas's forehand before rushing toward the stairs. "Come on! To Mommy's lab!"

As Thomas followed Rachael to her bedroom/office/lab, he realized he forgot to ask another question: how long would each transformation take?

Rachael had rummaged through her room and hauled out what looked like a small metal kettle with poly-carbonate tubing attached to the spout and a car battery melted into the side. If Thomas had known his mom would use the atomizer so much he would have been more careful about building it with her.

“Okay, let me test this out first,” said Rachael as she dumped the contents of the blue vial into the device. She squeezed an asthma spacer onto the tubing, locked her lips around the mouthpiece, flipped the switch. . .

Nothing happened. Rachael was confused – she did try using the atomizer with her new homemade vape liquid last week, but surely that wasn't enough to gunk up the works?

“Mommy, you forgot this.” Thomas walked over and plugged the atomizer into the wall socket. The atomizer roared to life. Rachael shrugged her shoulders in apology as a white cloud filled the spacer.

Rachael began to take deep breaths, drawing the formula deep into her lungs. A sour taste coated her tongue, and she made a mental note to never use cotton candy flavor in her experiments again. She finished inhaling the formula after five breaths. As she pulled the mouthpiece from her lips, unplugged the atomizer, and began rinsing out the apparatus, she could feel a slight buzz kicking in. She also noticed the formula’s aftertaste – a light, tingling sweetness. Perhaps cotton candy wasn't so bad after all.

With the atomizer and spacer cleaned, Rachael set up the device and poured in the contents of the pink vial. Thomas pulled the spacer to his mouth and nodded, signaling Rachael to flip the switch. A thick honey-like flavor filled Thomas’s mouth as he began to inhale the formula. Thomas couldn't take breaths as large as his mother’s so he finished after ten. As he set down the spacer, Thomas began to cough and hack.

Rachael rushed to him. “Tommy! What’s wrong?”

“This . . . tastes . . . horrible!” Thomas choked out. The formula had taken on a strong bitter edge, forming a bittersweet wave that rolled down his throat and spilled across his lips. “What is this?”

“It should be cotton candy, just like mine.” Rachael patted her son’s back. “Why don’t you rinse out your mouth downstairs, sweetie? I’ll finish cleaning the lab.”

Thomas stumbled out of the room as Rachael began cleaning her bench. Neither noticed the changes which were already beginning.

Thomas couldn't hold back his laughter. As crazy as his mom’s ideas were, he always found their adventures surprising and fun at every turn. Rachael stopped shaking the vials and dumped them both into her hand. The formula had gelled so that there were two small globs, one blue and one pink. She popped the blue one into her mouth and handed the pink one to her son.

“Hold this under your tongue and wait for it to melt. Do not swallow it or else the formula won’t have any effect.” Rachael began heading towards the stairs. “I need to pick up some things from work, so make sure to finish your homework before I get back. We’re going to have something special for dinner tonight,” she said with a wink.

Thomas followed his mother down the stairs to pick up his book bag, which he left at the door. The formula was slowly melting under his tongue, filling his mouth with a honey-like sweetness.

“Mommy, the formula tastes really good. What did you add into it?”

Rachael’s face was twisted into a sour pucker. “Really?” she asked. “Mine doesn't taste good at all. It’s cotton candy in both, or so I thought.”

Rachael shrugged on her coat. “Be good, okay? I’ll be home really soon.”


The formula, absorbed into their bloodstreams, began to slowly change mother and son. Whose perspective will the story follow next?

"How are we felling today Michael" he asked, not seeing you because his eyes were barred in the clipboard he carried.

"Not all that well" I said. His eyes shot up at me.

"Um, where is Michael" he whispered to my mom.

"I'm afraid this is Michael" she said as I removed my sweatshirt and showed him the M shaped birthmark on my arm. He was the only person outside of our family who had ever seen it.

We stood in silence for a moment, then I said "I woke up this morning and wasn't feeling good. After my mom left, I got up, had some frosted flakes, then fell asleep on the couch. When I woke up, I was a girl"

"Ok, give me a moment while I call a friend. He is a scientists who has been studying this topic for the past couple years" doctor Samuels said. He left the room and went to his office a few doors down the hall. After a minute he came back into the room. "My friend will be here in five minutes. Would you mind waiting" he asked.

"No problem" my mother answered.

The five minutes passed uneventfully, as I played games on my iPhone. I was starting to get bored when two men came into the room. One was dressed in a lab coat and looked like a stereotypical scientists. The other man was dressed in a black suit jacket, white dress shirt, black pants and shoes, and no tie.

"Michael Smith?" The man in the lab coat asked me.

"Yes" I answered.

"My name is George Black. I'm a scientists who studies the genetic disorder called Gendrotica. It's a disorder that, well as you can guess, changes a persons gender. This is my government connection Mr. Tanner White. He technically works for the department of health and human services, but in reality his job is to find the funding for the research of genetic disorder" he explained.

"So, I have this Gendrotica" I asked.

"We will need to run some tests to be 100% positive, but most likely the answer is yes" Mr. Black said

"So, what do we have to do after the tests" my mom asked.

"Well" Mr. White started. "After the tests we will provide you with additional or new documents. Extra stuff to fill out to go with your birth certificate, new drivers license, passport. We can also transfer you to a new school if you would like."

"Well I would like to stay in my school" I said.

"Ok" Mr. White said.

"Let's get started with the tests" Mr Black said. "All we need is some blood and urine samples, then we look at them and compare them to other tests you've had done. Then we see if you have the specific disorder"

"And while he is doing the tests, I'll be taking you out for a short driving test to make sure your motor skills are still good" Mr. White said. "By then the tests will have come back. If they come back positive, I will give you a debit card that withdraws money from a government account for ninety days. During those ninety days, you can spend as much as you want for clothing, school supplies, health and medical supplies. We will also print off the new paperwork and inform your school."

We got started on the test. First they had me pee in a cup and then drew some blood. They had me wait five minutes before Mr. White took me outside for a road test. When we finally went for the drive, I was in a little discomfort with the seatbelt resting between my new breasts. Other than that difference, I passed the test with flying colors. We finished in twenty minutes, then went back to check on the test results that we all knew would come up positive for Gendrotica. Just as we walked threw the hospital doors, Mr. White got a text message on his phone from Mr. Black. "The tests are officially positive. We can head down stairs and get started on the paper work" he said. "Your mom and Mr. Black will be there shortly after us"

"Ok" I mumbled. "So, what do we gotta do"

"Well, first we will take your measurements. Then you will fill out some information that you will need to keep with your birth certificate. While that is going on we will be creating new drivers licenses, passport, the works" Mr. White said.

We began taking measurements when we got to the basement. I was measured to be 5 feet 9 and 1/2 inches, 134.7lbs. He then went and wrote the information, along with some other stuff like hair and eye color. Right before we started printing Mr. White asked "What do you want your name to be? I don't think the Cops will believe your name is Michael anymore"

"That's true" added Mr. Black.

We put the name on the documents and then we printed them. It was a long process. "This is the only hospital in the state that can creat a drivers license or passport" Mr. White said.

"I guess so, where do we start" I asked.

"Well, first we eat breakfast, then we take that credit card you got from the government and get you some new clothes and shoes" she told me.

After finishing breakfast, Carla stood up and said "Meet me in my room once your done." With that she left for her bedroom. I started to eat very slow, but it still was only five minutes before I was done. I got up and slowly walked to Carla's room, fearing what might be in store for me today.

Walking in, I saw her on her bed. "Don't worry" she said seeing the look on my face. "We are only doing your hair. We can skip the makeup" she said. "Sit down right here and let me get started"

She worked for a couple minutes in silence before speaking again. "Now, let's get you dressed"

"What's wrong with what I have now" I asked.

"For starters, sweats are only ok for relaxing around the house" she said as she grabbed the jeans I had wore to the meeting on Friday. I wasn't going to tell her I had already had them on. Then she pulled out a black compression shirt ( http://m.kohls.com/kohlsopenapi/productm... ). "Put these on. I tried to pick something a little more you for today"

"Thanks" I said as I took the clothes. I put them on quickly and then went and got the running shoes from my trip to the mall with my mom earlier in the week.

"Good choice. Those will be great for our day" Carla said as she put on a pair of runners herself. Once she was done we left for the mall. It was a quick five minute drive there, and we were able to get a decent parking spot. Once we got in the first store, it was a field day for Carla. She recommended that we start with tops, and I didn't object. I don't know how, but she managed to find a lot of tops that I was ok with wearing, that I wouldn't have looked at without some help. Sure, there was stuff I said no way to, but for the most part everything she had suggested I at least tried on and most of it I liked enough to end up buying. She even got me trying on bras, but a lot of the ones we ended up buying were sports bras.

After we had been trying on tops (and bras) for close to a two and a half hours in several stores, I said "I think we have enough for now". I looked at all the bags as did Carla. There had to be at least fifteen bags all filled with tops.

"I think your right. Let's put these in moms van" she said. She hurried me out of the mall and to the car. Even with all the back seats folded down, the van was almost half full. "Alright, now for the bottoms" she said. It was impossible not to hear the excitement in her voice.

"Alright, here is where I will be drawing the line. No dresses, skirts, or super skinny jeans" I told her as we walked in.

"Will you at least try on a skirt. You might be surprised and like it. But I can promise nothing super skinny, or super short. Just short" she said. "Oh, but you will need something for like church and when you need to give a presentation at school. That may be to only time you wear a dress or skirt"

"Fine" I said. And we were off.

When we made it back inside, we started looking for pants. Carla had my try on tons of jeans, from different colors to different sizes. What I mean is some were skinnier that others. We ended up with fifteen different pairs of jeans, no two were the same. We also had eighteen different pairs of shorts, from jean shorts to workout shorts. Then Carla took me to another area of clothing stores I had never been to. The section with skirts. She went and had me wait in a changing booth.

"Wait here, I'll find one for you to try" Carla said as she closed the door and left me. I started to wonder what she was going to get me, but pretty soon she was back and handed me a black skirt that came down to my knees ( https://m.lulus.com/products/121674 ). Putting it on, I was surprised when I actually liked it. It was a different feeling from what I was used to.

"Wow, that looks better on you than I thought it would" Carla said. "Spin around, let me see how it looks from the back" she ordered. I did as she said.

"I think we can get just this one" I said.

"Your no fun" she said sarcastically. "Come on, there's lots more to at least look at. I won't make you try them on unless you want to"

"Well, I guess there's no harm in just looking" I replied. I looked at a clock and it read 4:10. "How have we been here for five hours already. I mean, it's felt like a long time but not five hours"

"It's a girl thing. I've spent twelve hours here one time with my friends and we didn't even go to every store" Carla said. "This should be plenty of clothes. Do you want to go home or start looking at shoes? If we don't do it today, we'll need to come back tomorrow"

My mouth dropped when she said we would be coming back. "What's wrong with the shoes I've already bought?" I asked gesturing to my feet.

"Those were just to get by" Carla answered. "A girl needs plenty of shoes for every occasion"

"Well, then let's go put these bags in the car and get started. I'm starting to remember why I never would go shopping with you and mom" I said as we began walking to the car.

"You would be surprised. This is a ton of fun once you get the hang of it" Carla replied.

Once we put the bags of pants, shorts, and a few skirts and a dress or two (I really don't remember because the day was starting to blur into one big memory for me) in the car we moved it closer to the mall. When we walked into the shoe store, I quickly realized why we were in this one. It was Carla's favorite store in the whole mall. From what I had heard, the store was divided into four different sections. The categories are Casual, Sandals, Boots, and Athletic. And there was a lot of each.

"Let's start you off in the casual. We can find your size and then I'll let you find all the shoes you like" she said.

"Your not helping anymore?" I asked.

"Shoes are different than clothes. In my opinion, you have to pick yourself. If someone else picks for you, there is no telling how long we will be here" she answered while sitting down in a chair. It made sense to me, but she is starting to get tired like me, so I can give her a rest. Looking through the shelves filled with different shoes, I ended up picking three pairs that I liked. There was a pair of boat shoes ( http://www.shoes.com/en-US/Product/EC120... ), a pair of grey converse's, and some slippers ( http://www.shoes.com/en-US/Product/EC109... ). I brought these to Carla and she approved them

Setting the shoes down, I headed over to the sandal section. There was so meany to look at but I finally picked a pair of flip flops ( http://www.shoes.com/en-US/Product/EC138... ), a pair of reeboks ( http://www.shoes.com/en-US/Product/EC133... ), and another pair that it seemed like lots of girls at my school would wear ( http://www.shoes.com/en-US/Product/ec135...) and took them for Carla to see.

"What?" I asked.

"I didn't say anything" she answered. "Now, off to the boots"

I was a tad bit scared at first, but I figured the best way to get over that fear was to try something on. I tried a pair of knee high boots first because that was another common sight with girls at my school. I ended up liking the first pair ( http://www.shoes.com/en-US/Product/ec136... ) so much I picked out a second ( http://www.shoes.com/en-US/Product/EC132... ) and something to keep my feet smaller during the winter months ( http://www.shoes.com/en-US/Product/EC132... ). I brought them to Carla and went to the last section before she could say anything.

The last section was athletic shoes. This, of course, was the most conferrable section. I was still uneasy because it was girls shoes that I was buying after all and I had spent my whole life up until this point a guy. But I pressed on. I picked out an extra pair of running shoes ( http://m.kohls.com/kohlsopenapi/productm... ) figuring that this would be enough for today. I brought the shoes to Carla, we paid for all of them, and then we went home. When the car started, I couldn't believe it. We had spent almost six and a half hours shopping for clothes.

*However, what I didn't know was as I was going around picking shoes, Carla had secretly deployed her friends to pick even more shoes for me. All she did was give them my new shoe size, and had the cashier hold the card for them, and I'd wake up the next morning with at least 40 pairs of shoes I'd never have chosen, from flats to heels. However, as I'd grow older and go on in the year, I would learn to be more like a girl and try as well as like the shoes they'd chosen for me. But I'd never let any of them know that.*

Kimberly was pissed off. "At least I don't play video games 24/7!"

"At least I don't have bloody underwear every month!"

"Yeah like I can control that!"

Brad's friend Micheal walked by their fight. He hates when they fight. He wished they could just make up and at least not hate each other.

Kimberly and Diane stomped off.

"I'm sorry bro she just gets on my nerves a lot."

"You guys need to figure it out because everyone hates it when you guys fight." Michael and Brad did a handshake as Brad walked off to his next class.

When Michael walked into class, he started to talk to Gabe who sits right next to him. "Hey Michael, what's wrong?"

That night, Michael met Gabe behind Target.

Gabe began to pull something out of his backpack, "My dad is a world class inventor. I asked him to make something that could brainwash Brad and Kim so they would stop fighting. So he built this..."

Gabe pulled out a gun of some sort. It was an awkward shape, hard to describe. "This will brainwash them to stop fighting. My dad said it should work perfectly fine, but he couldn't find anyone to test it on."

1531.content:
"An orange mocha frappuccino with extra whipped cream please"

Samantha Aston groaned. The 16-year-old was just starting the second hour of an five-hour shift at Starbucks and she was already annoyed. Samantha had started working there six months ago part-time as a way to save up money for a car. Well, she wasn't saving enough money ($875) and she felt her sanity slipping.

"I'm sorry sir, we don't make that drink here." The perturbed customer glared at her. "Areeeee you sureeee?"

"Yes. I wouldn't even know how to make an orange mocha-"

"Look, missus, maybe you should get your manager." Samantha could feel her teeth slowly grinding themselves into dust.

"Our menu has a series of options. I can provide you with a mocha frappuccino. It's delicious." The customer was not having it. "Look, I want the orang mocha frappuccino I saw in Zoolander and I want it now!" Samantha had enough. "THIS IS NOT ZOOLANDER AND WE DO NOT MAKE THAT DRINK, NOW ORDER SOMETHING ELSE!" she screamed from the top of her lungs.

---------------------

Following her outburst, Samantha was a Starbucks barista no longer and realized that her dream of buying a car was that much farther away. The teenager, of Indian-Israeli descent, brushed her long black curly hair away from her face as she was walking home. The cold November wind was already pissing her off. She hated this time of year...the weather dropped 15 degrees ago and it started getting dark before 5:00.

Samantha was frustrated. Her mother and father was already saving money for her college education, whic meant that she had to try to buy a used car all on her own. She didn't particularly NEED the car, she just wanted it. All of her friends had one and she didn't want to feel left out. Plus, the car would represent her first steps towards independence. Samantha knew that life had big things ahead for her, she just wasn't sure what they were.

As she was walking down the street, she saw a flyer posted on a lightpole:

UNIVERSITY OF DUVENT GENDER STUDY
LOOKING FOR ALL WILLING PARTICIPANTS
SIX-MONTH STUDY, PAYS $15,000 IF COMPLETED
LEARN WHAT IT REALLY MEANS TO BE A MAN OR WOMAN

Samantha was gobsmacked. $15,000?!?!!? That would be enough to get her a new car and then some. The university was 15 minutes walking from her house. She reversed direction and started sprinting towards the university.campus.

--------------------------

After 10 minutes of walking and another 10 minutes of looking, Samantha had finally found the research center.

Walking up to the receptionist area, Samantha blurted "um, I'm here to get more info about the gender study."

"Hmm, you're quite young...I'm not sure if Dr. Creight has an age limit for this." the receptionist pondered. "Well, fill this paperwork out and go ahead and take a seat, he'll be with you shortly.

Samantha sat down. She looked over the papers, asking general information and some weird psychology questions such as "What do you consider your most appealing trait" and "Do you ever feel obligated to make certain choices?" After filling out the questionnaire, she waited for what seemed like an eternity, before hearing an old man's voice.

"Samantha?" the old man asked. "Hi, I'm Dr. Alex Creight. Why don't you follow me into my office."

------------

Samantha was intimidated from the outset. The 58-year-old professor stood a foot over her 5"4 frame, and had the look of a man who had been doing this for a very long time.

The teen plopped into the chair opposite Creight's desk. He looked at her for minute, collected his thoughts and began:

"Gender is a concept that has existed for quite a long time, and yet, in the last 30 plus years, we have really started to ask ourselves "what does gender actually mean"? For the longest time, we had it conflated with biological sex; if you're born with a penis and testes, you're a man, and if you have ovaries and a vagina, you're a woman. However, we've come to see through not just transgender people but straight and queer people, that gender identity is a wholly separate concept from biological sex."

Samantha wondered where this conversation was heading.

"With that being said, the conflation exists in many people's minds still. So, the University of Duvent and a molecular biology institute decided to pair up for a study that asks a simple question; what, exactly, makes a man and a woman a woman?"

Samantha was confused. "Sooooo.....what are you paying people 15k for?"

Dr. Creight laughed. "This is not a typical study. This requires an effort, a sacrifice. If you decide to follow through on this study, you will be required to transform. Samantha, you will look like a 16-year-old biological male and have the reproductive parts of a 16-year-old male. For six months, you will live as a teen boy."

Unable to fully process what was just said to her, Samantha stared at the professor with her jaw dropped.

-----------------

Dr. Creight explained the experiment further. The institute had provided machinery and chemicals that could change a person at the molecular level. The person who underwent the transformation would go back into their normal environment. They would write weekly diaries about their experiences in their new body, how they feel, how people treat them, and how it's altered the way they think/act. After the six-month period, the participants would be changed back into their original bodies and be required to follow up with diaries three months after that. For Samantha, she would start in January, after winter break, and end in June.

"This study will provide a never-before-seen view into just how much a person's body shapes their self-image and their interactions with the rest of the world. Your experience, especially given how young you are, would provide insight into how early these notions are born and reinforced."

There were a billion thoughts going through Samantha's head, and about 99% of them amounted to "why are you even considering this, it's insane!". And it was. She was an attractive 16-year-old with friends, a boyfriend, and a good amount of self-confidence. Would she toss all that away for money? Yet....it was a lot of money. It would help her, her family, and her future. There was also the possibility that this experience would help her grow as an individual, make her more of a well-rounded person.

Whatever she decided, it wasn't going to be today.

"This sounds very interesting, and I'm super tempted, obviously, but I need time to think. "

Dr. Creight nodded. "That's okay. This is a big life change; it shouldn't be done in haste and without a lot of thought. However, we're going to move forward with the study soon, so I need to have a definitive answer from you two weeks from now."

Samantha got up to leave. "You will". As she was walking out the door, Dr. Creight stopped her.

"One more thing...as a minor, I will need both of your parent's consent to conduct this study on you."

She rolled her eyes. $15,000 didn't seem like it would be worth all this effort.

15521211.content:
"My name is Ben." You say uneasily.

"Benjamin?" He says incredulously.

"No, it's Ben..." You start before trailing off after seeing the boy's shocked facial expression. "Jordan? Is that you?"

"You bet it is!" Your room mate proclaims happily. "One moment I walk in and pick up a coin, the next thing I know I look like this in this house."

"Same thing happened to me, too." You reply.

Jordan walks over to you and grabs your hand, tugging you towards the door. "Here, follow me."
15521211.title: Respond

choices: He's happy with the way things are
155212111.content:
Dragging you along the hallway back to the bedroom you were in originally, he says, "Come'n already." Noticing that Jordan was likely the same age as you but more wiring and robust-looking, you sigh.

"Well, then slow down. You're going too fast." Slowing his pace slightly, you stood side by side with Jordan in the messy room a few seconds later. He runs over to the bed on the right and jumps onto it as a pair of shorts slide off the side.
155212111.title: Follow Jordan

choices: Jordan jumps over to you and drag you to the bed .
1552121112.content:
You stand there watching Jordan jumping up and down on the bed, looking down on the floor where Jordan's shorts had slid off.....

Watching Jordan, you begin to grow hard, watching him jumping up and down ... and you think, this may not be all bad ........
1552121112.title: He's happy with the way things are

1553.content: Should a female become older or younger?
1553.title: Female AR/AP?

15531.content: How fast was the change?
15531.title: Girl to Woman

choices: A 6 year old becomes a 40 year old
155311.title: Instant

choices: Helen looks to be 15 or 16 years old
15532.content:
Helen Miller is a reporter on a small town news paper . She is a tall 40 year old woman with two kids at home . Mike is her husband of 20 yrs . They move from New York to Redford Fall to four years ago .

The local people are friendly and bit strange to city folk . The New paper hired Helen a few months ago . The editor ask her to write a story about strange happens to the north of town .

She drove out to speak with eye witnesses . They spoke of balls of light float in the woods after sun set . Helen call up Mike to let him know she is working on a story . Her idea is to check out the woods after sunset . The farmer suggested she stay clear and watch from his farm house .

Helen decided to walk about the woods with a flash light . An fallen tree made a good place to sit and wait . Her eyes watched the sun set . The woods become very dark . The screen display the time of 7:01 pm. A deer leaped over the log . It shocked her . The white tail bounces back in to the darkness .

Helen look back to way the deer come from . Three yellow balls of light moves toward her . She stand up to get a picture of the light balls . One of ball flew a few feet from her . It bobbed up and down . Helen spoke the word "hello" . The yellow light ball darted around her twice before discharging a yellow beam into her chest . Helen passed out .

The farmer and his wife watch from their back deck . They only saw the yellow lights moving in the dark woods . Helen can not be seen . They waited for five minutes before going to look for Helen . The two walk into the woods with very bright flash light . The wife discovery Helen laying on the ground . Helen seem to be different . The farmer rolled Helen over to see that she now appear younger
15532.title: Woman to Girl

155323.content:
Helen eventually does wake up. She immediately closes her eyes again from the glare of ceiling lighting, having expected to have been still within the dark wilderness. Speaking of a light, she recalls having been hit with a beam of light just before she lost consciousness. From her surroundings, she can tell that she has been taken to a hospital. With that in mind, she cannot tell if her experience from that night was a dream or not. She does not even know if it is actually still that night, considering she has, for the moment, lost her track of time.

"Oh, thank goodness," she hears a stranger's voice call out to her direction. Helen flinches a little until she figures that this person must be her physician. "Are you okay, little girl?"

'Wait,' she thinks to herself. 'Little girl? I'm not a little...' She looks onto her hands as she lifts up her arms. Her arms have become much more short and stubby since she last saw them. Even her fingers, which were once dainty and manicured, consist of a surprising amount of baby fat. Not to mention, her whole body feels wrong... familiar... but wrong. She will figure out soon enough that she has been reverted to the age of...
155323.title: too young to be a teen

1553232.content:
"How are you, sweetie?" the physician asks her. The patronizing.tone of voice used and the question itself does nothing but anger Helen. She has to restrain herself to not rudely shout.

"I'm a grown woman." Helen whines with a cute voice. Instead of backing off, though, the physician suppresses a smirk, as if trying not to laugh.

"I'm sorry. It's just that you don't appear to be any older than six." Helen's mind goes on pause for a second, trying to figure how anyone can come to that mistaken conclusion.

"I'm not six!" Her voice starts breaking from annoyance. "I have ___ kid(s) older than that."
1553232.title: six-years old

choices: does not believe that she is her mother
15532321.content:
Helen stops herself during mid-sentence from the sudden recollection of her daughter. Amelia, who has turned eleven, since last week, has always been a difficult kid. She always meant well, but things between the two of the them would often get tense. On top of her always getting frustrated whenever Helen's passion for her work gets in the way of any quality time they could have been spending together, she also always wanted a little sister to complicate things.

Before she can fully take in the irony of the situation, the physician calls out to her. "Lucky for you, your family is already here to visit." Helen could only squeak before her husband and daughter came into the room. Amelia immediately sees Helen and ___
15532321.title: upcoming trouble with Amelia

info.brief_description: A victim changes age and/or gender. Turn a grown man into a little girl and other things.
info.description:
This is exactly what was previously pointed out. Write about AP, AR, TG, TGAR and TGAP.

1) Watch the grammar and vocabulary as well as the rating.

2) Obviously, I don't care how long a choice passage ("Which thing do you want?") is, but I would like some length and effort for the story parts of this interactive.

3) Have fun
